course.created: Created new course with title {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the course {{ title }}? All associated elements will be deleted, including exams, exercises, repositories and build plans. This action can NOT be undone!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the name of the course to confirm.

course.title: Title

maxComplaints.title: Maximum number of complaints per student
maxComplaints.description: Set the maximum number of complaints allowed per student. Accepted complaints do not count toward this quota. This limit applies only to individual exercises.

maxTeamComplaints.title: Maximum number of complaints per team
maxTeamComplaints.description: Set the maximum number of complaints allowed per team. Accepted complaints do not count toward this quota. This limit applies only to team exercises.

maxComplaintTimeDays.title: Complaint due date in days after result date
maxComplaintTimeDays.description: This number refers to days after the result is available (assessment due date or result date, depending on which one is later). Students will not be able to submit any more complaints after this due date.

maxComplaintTextLimit.title: Maximum number of characters per complaint
maxComplaintTextLimit.description: This value indicates the maximum number of characters a student may use per complaint.

maxComplaintResponseTextLimit.title: Maximum number of characters per complaint response
maxComplaintResponseTextLimit.description: This value indicates the maximum number of characters that may be used for the response per complaint.

complaintsEnabled.title: Enable complaints
complaintsEnabled.description: Enabling this allows students to complain about assessments.

requestMoreFeedbackEnabled.title: Enable more feedback requests
requestMoreFeedbackEnabled.description: This option allows students to request more feedback without complaining. Asking for further feedback will not count towards the number of complaints, but it will also not allow modification of the assessment. By default, this option is enabled, but it can be disabled if assessment corrections must always be possible.

maxRequestMoreFeedbackTimeDays.title: More feedback request due date in days after result date
maxRequestMoreFeedbackTimeDays.description: This number refers to days after the result is available (assessment due date or result date, depending on which one is later). Students will not be able to request more feedback after this due date.

customizeGroupNames.title: Customize group names
customizeGroupNames.description: Customizing the group names should not be necessary and may cause users to lose access to this course. Make sure you have a good reason for customizing the group names.

maxPoints.title: Maximum number of points for course
maxPoints.info: This value is used for example calculations (e.g. in the grading key) and does not influence the students' grades. The grades are calculated based on the points achievable in the course.

course.accuracyOfScores: Number of decimal places used for calculating the scores

testCourse.title: Test Course
testCourse.description: Activate this checkbox for courses used for testing.

learningPaths.label: Learning Paths Enabled
learningPaths.tooltip: Enables generation of individualized learning paths for students consisting of competencies and their linked learning materials.

dashboard.label: Student Course Analytics Dashboard Enabled
dashboard.tooltip: Activates the course analytics dashboard for the course for students, tutors and instructors. The dashboard enables users to track their progress and performance in the course.

restrictedAthenaModulesAccess.label: Access to Restricted Athena Modules Enabled
restrictedAthenaModulesAccess.tooltip: If this option is selected, the course's exercises can also use restricted Athena modules for feedback generation.

onlineCourse.title: Online Course
onlineCourse.description: Activate this checkbox for external online courses (e.g. on edX/Moodle) so that students can use this Artemis course (via the LTI interface). This also allows automatic account creation if enabled by the Artemis system administrator. You can further configure this in the LTI Configuration page.

communicationEnabled.label: Communication Enabled
communicationEnabled.tooltip: Enables communication between course users in private or public channels which can only be created by instructors and tutors. Students can interact with peers and ask questions while moderators can provide course information and answer content-related questions. The communication can happen directly on the page of the respective exercise or lecture or in the dedicated communication space of the course.

messagingEnabled.label: Direct Messages / Group Chats Enabled
messagingEnabled.tooltip: Enables messaging between course users in group chats or direct messages. Every user can start a direct message, private group chat and add other users. A group chat is limited to 10 members. The chats happens in the communication space of the course.

faqEnabled.label: FAQ Enabled
faqEnabled.tooltip: Enables the creation of FAQ entries where instructors can compile frequently asked questions in an organized manner. Students can access this knowledge base to independently review topics and resolve their questions on their own.

enrollmentEnabled.title: Student Course Enrollment Enabled
enrollmentEnabled.description: Activate this checkbox to allow students to enroll independently in the course if it is active (between start and end of the course). You can optionally enter a message that students have to confirm during enrollment.

unenrollmentEnabled.title: Student Course Unenrollment Enabled
unenrollmentEnabled.description: Activate this checkbox to allow students to unenroll independently in the course. You can specify the latest date for unenrollment, otherwise the students can do so until the end of the course.

search.noResults: No exercises matching this search query were found

shortname.minlength: Short Name must contain at least 3 characters.
shortname.forbidden: Short Name must start with a letter and cannot contain special characters.

startDate.invalid: Must be before the end date of the course

endDate.invalid: Must be after the start date of the course

enrollmentStartDate.invalid: Can't be after the start date of the course and must be before the enrollment end date

enrollmentEndDate.invalid: Can't be after the end date of the course and must be after the enrollment start date

unenrollmentEndDate.invalid: Must be after enrollment end date and can not be after the end date of the course

form.invalidForm: Please fill in all required fields.

courseGroup.searchForUsers: Add a user to this group by searching for login or name
courseGroup.name: Name

removeFromGroup.modalQuestion: Are you sure you want to remove the user with login {{ title }} from this course group?

cleanup.title: Cleanup
cleanup.question: Are you sure you want to clean up the course {{ title }}? This will delete all student programming exercise repositories for course exercises and exams. This action can NOT be undone!

course.notStartedYet: The course has not officially started yet. Official course start:
course.organizationAddingHint: Administrators can add organizations to courses.

courseStatistics.activeStudentsExplanation: Active students are students that submitted at least once in the corresponding week.

scopeButton.periodTooltip: Activity of the last {{ amount }} weeks.
scopeButton.overviewTooltip: Activity since the course start date till now.
